trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to create a new mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Follow these steps to create a new mobile service.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the navigation pane, click +NEW.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the navigation pane, click +NEW.

trans-unit.source: This displays the Create a Mobile Service dialog.
trans-unit.target: This displays the Create a Mobile Service dialog.

trans-unit.source: In the Create a Mobile Service page, select Create a free 20 MB SQL Database, select .NET runtime, then type a subdomain name for the new mobile service in the URL textbox.
trans-unit.target: In the Create a Mobile Service page, select Create a free 20 MB SQL Database, select .NET runtime, then type a subdomain name for the new mobile service in the URL textbox.

trans-unit.source: Click the right arrow button to go to the next page.
trans-unit.target: Click the right arrow button to go to the next page.

trans-unit.source: This displays the Specify database settings page.
trans-unit.target: This displays the Specify database settings page.

trans-unit.source: As part of this tutorial, you create a new SQL Database instance and server.
trans-unit.target: As part of this tutorial, you create a new SQL Database instance and server.

trans-unit.source: You can reuse this new database and administer it as you would any other SQL Database instance.
trans-unit.target: You can reuse this new database and administer it as you would any other SQL Database instance.

trans-unit.source: If you already have a database in the same region as the new mobile service, you can instead choose Use existing Database and then select that database.
trans-unit.target: If you already have a database in the same region as the new mobile service, you can instead choose Use existing Database and then select that database.

trans-unit.source: The use of a database in a different region is not recommended because of additional bandwidth costs and higher latencies.
trans-unit.target: The use of a database in a different region is not recommended because of additional bandwidth costs and higher latencies.

trans-unit.source: In Name, type the name of the new database, then type Login name, which is the administrator login name for the new SQL Database server, type and confirm the password, and click the check button to complete the process.
trans-unit.target: In Name, type the name of the new database, then type Login name, which is the administrator login name for the new SQL Database server, type and confirm the password, and click the check button to complete the process.

trans-unit.source: You have now created a new mobile service that can be used by your mobile apps.
trans-unit.target: You have now created a new mobile service that can be used by your mobile apps.
